name: Examples of Single Escape Characters

sections.text:
;; The following examples assume the readtable case of *readtable*
      ;; and *print-case* are both :upcase.
      (eq 'abc '\A\B\C) =>  true
      (eq 'abc 'a\Bc) =>  true
      (eq 'abc '\ABC) =>  true
      (eq 'abc '\abc) =>  false

_otext:
